h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Dark Thunder Location
h3_title: Horse Guai Yellow Wind Ridge Location
content: When at Sandgate Village in Yellow Wind Ridge, loop around to the left and kill the Earth Wolf boss. Just behind it, you can find the Horse Guai tied to the post at the statue.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Dark_Thunder.md', within the main section titled 'Dark Thunder', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Dark Thunder Location' and the sub-subsection 'Horse Guai Yellow Wind Ridge Location'.
The content is as follows:
When at Sandgate Village in Yellow Wind Ridge, loop around to the left and kill the Earth Wolf boss. Just behind it, you can find the Horse Guai tied to the post at the statue.
